content: in celebration of flock fiber festival introducing the striped elements scarf a showpiece knitted from end to end in the round creating a long tubular scarf with all the smooth charm of stockinette and none of the pesky rolled edges choose your adventure hand knit it in the round or machine knit it flat and seam it into a cozy tube the pattern comes with everything you need from hand knitting and machine knitting instructions to detailed striping sequences get ready to flaunt your stripes in style the pattern includes -hand knit instructions -machine knit instructions -detailed striping sequences ikigai fiber paka washi sport/ light dk - easy wash- 50% baby alpaca/ 50% merino wool- 135 yds 123m paka washi is a lightweight dk/sport weight yarn that s as easy-going as it is gorgeous machine washable and irresistibly soft it boasts a subtle halo and comes in a kaleidoscope of rich saturated colors seven colors featured here 1 skein ea color a d e f & g 2 skeins color c 4 skeins color b version 1 using salt as main color color a- pacific- 105 yds/ 99 m color b- salt- 520 yds/ 475 m color c- dolphin - 226 yds/ 207 m color d- chartruese - 105 yds/ 99 m color e- orchid - 105 yds/ 99 m color f- brick- 105 yds/ 99 m color g- geranium - 105 yds/ 99 m version 2 using seafoam as main color color a- jet- 105 yds/ 99 m color b- seafoam- 520 yds/ 475 m color c- salt - 226 yds/ 207 m color d- geranium - 105 yds/ 99 m color e- flamingo - 105 yds/ 99 m color f- dijon- 105 yds/ 99 m color g- buttercup - 105 yds/ 99 m a bonus hat pattern utilizing yarn remnants from the scarf is also included paka washi yarn kits are available for purchase here https //www pampowersknits com/collections/knitting-kits/products/a-opie-designs-striped-elements-scarf
